vike play hubert h. humphrey metrodom 1982 2013. minnesota vike american footbal team play nation footbal leagu (nfl). member north divis nation footbal confer (nfc). team establish 1959, three minneapoli businessmen – bill boyer, h. p. skoglund max winter – award franchis new american footbal leagu (afl).[1] januari 1960, ownership group, along berni ridder, forfeit afl membership award nfl' 14th franchise, play begin 1961.[1] sinc franchise' inception, vike complet 54 season play nfl. team one nfl championship 1969, last team crown nfl champion afl–nfl merger 1970. franchis confer champion three time sinc merger, never super bowl. vike division champion 19 times, among current member division. minnesota play 804 regular post-season game appear post-season 28 times.[2] team' worst season 1962, two games, lost eleven, tie one (a .179 win percentage).[3] worst season sinc nfl chang 16-game schedul 1984 2011, could manag 3–13 record.[4] best regular-season record achiev 1998, vike went 15–1, kicker gari anderson, gone 35-for-35 field goal attempt regular season, miss 38-yard attempt less three minut remain nfc championship game.[5] overtim loss atlanta falcons, vike becam first 15–1 team nfl histori reach super bowl.[6] content 1 key 2 season 3 footnot 4 refer key[edit] bba bert bell award coy nfl coach year award cpi nfl comeback player year award dpi nfl defens player year award gsh georg s. hala trophi moy walter payton man year award mvp nfl valuabl player award opi nfl offens player year award oroy nfl rooki year award pbmvp pro bowl valuabl player award roy upi nfl-nfc rooki year upinfc upi nfc player year seasons[edit] see also: histori minnesota vike nfl champion (1920–1969)† super bowl champion (1967–present)‡ confer champion (1967–present)° divis champion (1967–present)* wild card berth (1970–present)§ franchis record accord pro-footbal reference.com[7] nfl season team season leagu confer divis regular season post-season result award head record 2015 19 28 — playoff record 2015 468 407 10 regular season playoff footnotes[edit] vike defeat desper touchdown pass thrown cowboy quarterback roger staubach less minut left game. staubach coin phrase "hail mari pass", refer toss, game becam known "the hail mary".[21] b nfl expand 14-game regular season schedul 16 begin 1978.[22] c 1982 nfl season shorten 16 regular season game 9 due players' strike.[23] playoff seedings, divis stand ignor leagu use 16-team tournament format season.[24] 1987 nfl season shorten 16 regular season game 15 due players' strike.[25] f "finish", "wins", "losses", "ties" column list regular season result exclud postseason play. regular postseason record combin bottom list. references[edit] gener "minnesota vike history". cbssports.com. retriev 10
